info.+content: Pokémon the Series: XY - Kalos Quest

satoshi (ash) travel to the kalos region with his pokemon, pikachu. as always in his goal to be the pokemon master, he will start to collect gim badged to go to the kalos pokemon league meanwhile he get new pokemons, friends, trainers and rivals.
#1: "Pokemon Theme" by Ben Dixon and The Sad Truth (eps 1-49)
#2: "Be a hero" by Ben Dixon and The Sad Truth (eps 50-)
#3: "Getter Bambang" (ゲッタバンバン) by Tomohisa Sakō
#4: "GaoGao All Stars" by Little Glee Monster (eps 68-92)
ポケットモンスター エックスワイ

Do your best, Dedenne! Do it for Numera!
